detail_desc: Short-sleeved bodysuits in cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.

NATHALIE LÉTÉ x H&M. Soft toy made of soft faux fur with polyester padding and embroidered appliqués. Dressed in a removable patterned dress with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Length approx. 23 cm.

Lined triangle bikini top with wavy, overlocked edges and padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps that cross at the back, wide elastic at the hem and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Swim shorts with a tie at the front and elastication at the back. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Track jacket in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip down the front and side pockets. Woven sections under the arms and at the sides, ribbed cuffs and narrow trims around the collar and hem. Gently rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Vest top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with decorative buttons down the front.

Pyjamas with a shirt and shorts in soft cotton. Shirt with rounded notch lapels, buttons down the front and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist and frill-trimmed hems.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Sleeveless dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist and narrow shoulder straps with a decorative bow.
Vest top in printed jersey with an asymmetric, overlocked hem.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Long-sleeved jersey top.

One-button, velvet jacket with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets. Decorative buttons at the cuffs and a double back vent. Patterned lining. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Short, fitted turtleneck top in soft jersey.
Short-sleeved top in printed, fast-drying functional fabric.
Pool shoes with moulded soles that are fluted underneath.
Padded, sleeveless fancy dress costume in jersey.
Top in a soft, fine-knit modal and cotton blend with a ribbed stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in soft twill with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has pleats and a sewn-on tie belt at the front. Pockets in the side seams.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button and hard-worn details that are patched on the inside.
Socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Scarf in a soft, fluffy knit with fringes along the short sides. Size 50x180 cm.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved wrapover bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the side and crotch.

Short dress in crinkled jersey with a round neckline, short puff sleeves with narrow elastication and seams at the waist and on the skirt for added width. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and rounded hems.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Soft brushed inside.
Calf-length, V-neck dress in jersey with a slight sheen. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an elasticated seam at the waist and a heavily draping skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Long-sleeved satin shirt with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a kangaroo pocket, jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Two-piece dance costume with a glossy jersey body and a chiffon skirt. Body with gathers at the top, a low-cut back and short sleeves. Skirt with a glittery elastic waistband and a sewn-in wrapover at the front.
Blouse in an airy, softly draping, patterned weave with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front. Gathers at the shoulders, long, wide sleeves and wide cuffs with covered buttons. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in soft cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.

Shorts in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and a fake back pocket. Contrasting colour stripes down the sides and decorative seams on the legs. Soft brushed inside.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, a scalloped neckline and short puff sleeves with a scalloped edge.
Trousers in woven fabric. High waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a zip fly. Side pockets and tapered legs with creases.

Joggers in washed, stretch, flexible cotton denim for maximum comfort with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist. Fake fly with a button and front and back pockets.
Scarf in a soft jacquard weave with fringes on the short sides.

Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a broderie anglaise yoke and short, frilled collar. Concealed buttons at the top and long raglan sleeves with elastication and a frilled broderie anglaise trim at the cuffs.
Short, straight-cut dress in jersey made from a cotton blend with short sleeves.
Halterneck jumpsuit in a patterned crêpe weave with ties at the back of the neck and a deep V-neck at the front. Seam at the waist, a concealed zip in one side and straight legs. Lined at the top.
Skinny-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with a boat neck and concealed zip at the back. Panels set into the sides, 3/4-length sleeves and cuffs with a metal button. Lined. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft merino wool blend with a round neck, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and a hood with a wide, fine-knit drawstring.
5-pocket shorts in supersoft, stretch denim with adjustable elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist, and a fake fly and button.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
Socks knitted in cotton terry.
Cardigan in a soft, loose knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and buttons down the front.
Double-breasted jacket in a woven wool blend with notch lapels and flap front pockets.
Straight-cut top in woven fabric with short puff sleeves.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and a front fastening.

Fitted outdoor shorts in stretch, fast-drying functional fabric with a zip fly, press-stud at the waist, and hook and loop safety fastener at the waistband. Zipped front pockets, a zipped leg pocket and a stretch panel at the crotch for optimum mobility and comfort.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Single-breasted jacket woven in a wool blend with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons down the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette.
Shorts in stretch cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and jetted back pockets with a button. Slim Fit.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details that are patched on the inside. Relaxed fit with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and slightly shorter legs.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Twill cap with reversible sequins on the front and an adjustable plastic fastener at the back.

Short dress in crinkled chiffon with a straight-cut yoke at the top with a small frill trim and gathers. Long, wide sleeves with a seam and flared flounces, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Lined.
Alice band in a crinkled weave with a knot detail on top.
Sleeveless chiffon dress with elastication around the neckline, an elasticated seam at the waist and an asymmetric skirt with vertical flounces. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in sturdy jersey with a textured pattern, seam at the waist and side pockets.
Calf-length, halterneck dress in a cotton weave with wide ties that fasten at the back of the neck, and elastication at the back. Lined.
Calf-length skirt in pleated jersey with a sheen. Elasticated waist and a laser-cut edge at the hem. Unlined.

Short dress in lace made from a cotton blend with a deep V-neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow, covered elastication around the shoulders and concealed elastication and a frill trim at the hems. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim, and a flared skirt with a wide, scallop-edged flounce at the hem. Lined.
Slim-fit trousers in washed, superstretch twill with hard-worn details, front and back pockets and narrow, raw-edge, frayed hems.

Set with a sweatshirt and joggers in fast-drying functional fabric. Block-coloured top with a print motif on the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, seams at the knees and ribbing at the hems.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in a slub weave with narrow notch lapels and jetted front pockets. Lined.
Short microfibre slip with folded, glued edges at the top and a laser-cut hem for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes.
Shorts in stretch jersey with a denim look made from a cotton blend. Elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Pointelle-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Elasticated bracelets in various styles with wooden beads.

Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour side panels and a small print on one leg. Covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and a pocket with a taped zip at one side. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. The polyester content of the joggers is recycled.

Short sports shorts in fast-drying functional fabric lined with a pair of inner shorts. Wide, foldover ribbing at the waist for a more comfortable fit. The polyester content of the shorts is partly recycled.
Longjohns in stretch organic cotton jersey with flatlock seams, an elasticated waist, lined front and long legs with ribbed hems.
Cropped top in ribbed cotton jersey with a wide, round neckline, short sleeves and decorative buttons down the front.
